name: Project Water
description:
Project Water is an automated game that will give you a factorio-like experience, but I guarantee they are very different.

Here are some things to know about games

Water:

Affect the moisture of the plot, different plants have different moisture requirements.

- Food products: Used to make construction work

- Tree products: used for building

- Flower products: Used to complete the game's research objectives

Products:

By taking plants, processing them, synthesizing them to produce new products; For example, wheat → flour → bread

Construction:

Can carry out automatic production and processing of various products; What we need to do is to improve the efficiency of automated production and achieve the final research results more quickly

-- -- -- -- -- --

If you're interested in Project Water, please join our Discord for questions and suggestions, and we appreciate that.

We are Chinese developers and will be translating into English in the next few days. We hope you can join our Discord discussion first

Discord: https://discord.gg/4Q8WyvBynn
